title: Touch sensitivity near the edges is poor when typing, anyone else? - Pixel 5
content:
Basically as per the question.  I seem to get really bad sensitivity when typing.
  I have tried the device at the store and a friends and we get the same issue, so it's not just isolated.  It's on both sides of the screen.
  It's definitely worse with a screen protector but the same happens without one too.
  Maybe we need an increase sensitivity option?
